results.title: The Effect and Possible Mechanism of Intradiscal Injection of Simvastatin in the Treatment of Discogenic Pain in Rats
results.text_hl: At present, studies have shown that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ can delay the @<m>DISEASE_Intervertebral_Disc_Degeneration</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D055959 @@@degeneration of IVD@@@, but its effect on @DISEASE_Low_Back_Pain @DISEASE_MESH:D017116 @@@DLBP@@@ and its specific mechanism have not been reported.

citations.NLM: Huang X, Zheng C, Wang W, Ye X, Lin CY, Wu Z. The Effect and Possible Mechanism of Intradiscal Injection of Simvastatin in the Treatment of Discogenic Pain in Rats Front Neurosci. 2021;15():642436. PMID: 33815046
citations.BibTeX: @article{33815046, title={The Effect and Possible Mechanism of Intradiscal Injection of Simvastatin in the Treatment of Discogenic Pain in Rats}, author={Huang X and Zheng C and Wang W and Ye X and Lin CY and Wu Z}, journal={Front Neurosci}, volume={15}, pages={642436}}

results.title: Effects of simvastatin-loaded PLGA microspheres on treatment of rats with intervertebral disk degeneration and on 6-K-PGF1alpha and HIF-1alpha
results.text_hl: The effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ on @<m>DISEASE_Intervertebral_Disc_Degeneration</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D055959 @@@IVDD@@@ has been unanimously agreed, it improves bone quality by promoting the aggregation of type II collagen.

citations.NLM: Zhu K, Zhao F, Yang Y, Mu W. Effects of simvastatin-loaded PLGA microspheres on treatment of rats with intervertebral disk degeneration and on 6-K-PGF1alpha and HIF-1alpha Exp Ther Med. 2020 Jan;19(1):579-584. PMID: 31897100

results.title: Intradiscal injection of simvastatin retards progression of intervertebral disc degeneration induced by stab injury
results.text_hl: Intradiscal injection of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ retards progression of @<m>DISEASE_Intervertebral_Disc_Degeneration</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D055959 @@@intervertebral disc degeneration@@@ induced by @DISEASE_Headache_Disorders_Primary @DISEASE_MESH:D051270 @@@stab injury@@@

results.title: A new in vivo method to retard progression of intervertebral disc degeneration through stimulation of endogenous stem cells with simvastatin.
results.text_hl: A new in vivo method to retard progression of @<m>DISEASE_Intervertebral_Disc_Degeneration</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D055959 @@@intervertebral disc degeneration@@@ through stimulation of endogenous stem cells with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@.

results.title: Multiple-Exposure Drug Release from Stable Nanodroplets by High-Intensity Focused Ultrasound for a Potential Degenerative Disc Disease Treatment.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ has previously been found to be a potential @<m>DISEASE_Intervertebral_Disc_Degeneration</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D055959 @@@degenerative disc disease@@@ treatment.

results.title: Intradiscal injection of simvastatin results in radiologic, histologic, and genetic evidence of disc regeneration in a rat model of degenerative disc disease.
results.text_hl: Intradiscal injection of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ results in radiologic, histologic, and genetic evidence of disc regeneration in a @SPECIES_10116 @@@rat@@@ model of @<m>DISEASE_Intervertebral_Disc_Degeneration</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D055959 @@@degenerative disc disease@@@.

results.title: Potential prevention: orally administered statins may retard the pathologic process of disc degeneration.
results.text_hl: In addition, local injection of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ was preliminarily found to promote autogenous chondrogenic disc repair and retard @<m>DISEASE_Intervertebral_Disc_Degeneration</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D055959 @@@disc degeneration@@@.

results.title: Controlled release of simvastatin from in situ forming hydrogel triggers bone formation in MC3T3-E1 cells.
results.text_hl: This study demonstrated that controlled release of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SIM@@@ from a biodegradable, injectable GPT-hydrogel had a promising role for long-term treatment of chronic @DISEASE_Neurodegenerative_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D019636 @@@degenerative diseases@@@ such as @<m>DISEASE_Intervertebral_Disc_Degeneration</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D055959 @@@disc degenerative disease@@@.
